title: OCE Ping rates over the moon

replies.body:
hey thx for answerin :D 

- In Melbourne
- Optus
- ADSL 
- Wireless
- nope
- haven't had ping issues on NA servers

Thx again, hope this helps pinpoint any problems

If possible, could you please run the [network diagnostic test](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs), and email the results to riottoxichawk@riotgames.com.

Connecting from Melbourne, you should see great response times as our OCE game servers are in Sydney.  It would be interesting to find out what is causing this.
I received an email saying riottoxichawk@riotgames.com doesn't exist O.o, it also sent some random load of rubbish on it too XD
I've sent the results,{{summoner:4}} , have no clue what it says but yeh.... its done

Click "Reply" to Agent Mindstar's message to notify him.

I've taken liberty of that for this message.

Here's just some photographic proof it's not just another attempt to blame riot for loosing a game XD
seems I wasnt the only 1 lagging, but tbh this was one of the games wid least lagg for me

this is in loading screen, yeh and some ppl were pissed off at the long load time XD, this just happend tonight, first time I was ever the cause of loading screen w8, and first time shows ping tht high in loading screen.

Hi Rownin,

Having 500+ ping, if you are playing from within Oceania does seem very strange.  The vast majority of players in Oceania should see something closer to the 20 - 40 you describe (depending on location, of course)

A few questions:

* What city are you in?
* What internet provider do you use?
* What type of connection do you have?  (eg. ADSL / Cable / Fibre)
* Do you connect your computer to your home network via wireless or via a network cable?
* Do you use any kind of VPN service?
* Do you have the same ping issues on the NA servers as the OCE servers?

-Mindstar
